title: Exit Perry
author: VD
content_html: Somehow, I don’t think Ron Paul would have had any problem naming the agencies he would eliminate. Of course, this shouldn’t disqualify Perry as a potential president, considering that our current one believes there are 57 states.
content_text: Somehow, I don’t think Ron Paul would have had any problem naming the agencies he would eliminate.  Of course, this shouldn’t disqualify Perry as a potential president, considering that our current one believes there are 57 states.
